title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately applies changes
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately applies changes
OB: When a working set with one project is created and selected, the package view is filtered accordingly.
EB: The package view should not be immediately filtered when a working set is removed.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. 2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and delete the first one.
